firstNightReminder: Calculate the number of good/evil Potions that players received tonight. Then wake the Toll Inspector and show them the number of good potions and then the number of evil potions that were received.
otherNightReminder: Calculate the number of good/evil Potions that players received tonight. Then wake the Toll Inspector and show them the number of good potions and then the number of evil potions that were received.
name: Toll Inspector
ability: Each night, you learn how many potions of each alignment have been received since dawn.
flavor: I had to pay a ransom of six hundred pounds in gold. All might have gone well even yet, only that, by ins and outs and crookedness of laws, I was shorn like a sheep that is clipped to the quick.
